response.headline: Tateishi Park in Suwa, Japan offers stunning sunset and night views over Lake Suwa
response.summary: Tateishi Park in Suwa provides impressive sunset and night views. The location has 21.7M views on posts. Japanese traveler recommends it for people who love scenic destinations, praising both the sunset and nighttime scenery.

location_tags: 21.7M views on posts of this place

extracted_text: People who love "Your Name" should go here!
Everything from the sunset to the night view was really impressive
image_details.key_interest: Anime movie reference location with spectacular views
